title: Pixel 2XL sudden color washout
content:
Pixel 2XL. Purchased 3 months ago. Suddenly this evening whilst watching a film, the colours on my screen looked odd - it's like a yellow filter has been applied.
I have checked colour correction is off, started in safe mode, checked the different colour display options. Night mode is not on. I have restarted. There is no change.
Whites look yellow, black looks grey, all other colours are faded and I am noticing a flicker.
Any help very appreciated.
